Leave me a tip: https://ko-fi.com/eigenchris

Links/Sources:
Sean Carroll's 15-page PDF on cosmology: https://preposterousuniverse.com/wp-content/uploads/grnotes-eight.pdf
PDF with derivation of "3rd" Friedmann Equation based on Adiabatic expansion (page 19): https://www.uio.no/studier/emner/matnat/astro/nedlagte-emner/AST4220/h09/course-material/lectures.pdf
Article on Conservation of Energy in General Relativity: https://math.ucr.edu/home/baez/physics/Relativity/GR/energy_gr.html
de Sitter's 1917 paper: https://academic.oup.com/mnras/article/78/1/3/1239878
Video on mathematics of de Sitter space: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZ-4REivxRU
Equation for de Sitter space: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_Sitter_space#Definition
Equation for embedding Anti-de Sitter space: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anti-de_Sitter_space#Definition_and_properties
PDF building up dS and AdS space from the basics: http://3dhouse.se/ingemar/relteori/Kurs.pdf
Physics Stack exchange post about values of cosmological parameters: https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/314660/to-what-accuracy-do-we-know-the-value-of-the-cosmological-constant
Chronology of the Universe: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chronology_of_the_universe
Dark Energy Survey (estimated cosmological parameters): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dark_Energy_Survey
Video intro to Dark Energy Survey: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4TkyxLENS5Q
Dr Becky talks about Dark Energy Survey: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IHMFDxLcMYs
Cosmic Inflation: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inflation_(cosmology)
"Gravity in a Nutshell" by A. Zee also has chapters on de Sitter and anti-de Sitter spacetimes (IX.10 and IX.11)

Sources for the estimations of cosmological parameters:
WMAP: https://arxiv.org/pdf/0803.0732.pdf
BOOMERanG: https://arxiv.org/pdf/astro-ph/0004404.pdf
Planck: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lambda-CDM_model#Parameters

Other topics I didn't cover:
Killing Vectors: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killing_vector_field
Kerr Metric (rotating black holes): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kerr_metric
Einstein-Hilbert Action (Lagrangian formulation of GR): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Einstein%E2%80%93Hilbert_action
